recipesJson.name: Very Very Cold
recipesJson.author: STombs92
recipesJson.description: For when you're feeling stuffy, and want your sinuses to clear up no matter what.  Careful; if you're not a fan of menthol, or not used to menthol, cut the percentages in half.  This will punch you in the throat.  The Aloe just adds a little bit of juiciness and tames the astringent flavor of the Eucalyptus w/ Mint.
